title: Duch golema (svitek)
content:
Duch golema

"Notes contain the formula for a potion made with a Obsidiánové srdce golema. The potion unlocks an Intelligence upgrade when consumed."

This potion can only be brewed if Geralt defeats the Golem and takes its heart.

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Duch golema

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
400  	80  




Lokace
Kalkstein, poté, co mu dáte tarotovou kartu from Vaska which describes how to defeat the Sentry (attack the Golem in the Pohřebiště golemů).
